name: semillero-digital-platform
description: Plataforma complementaria para Semillero Digital que integra con Google Classroom

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.test: concurrently "cd backend && npm test" "cd frontend && npm test"
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd backend && npm run lint" "cd frontend && npm run lint"
scripts.lint:fix: concurrently "cd backend && npm run lint:fix" "cd frontend && npm run lint:fix"

author: Semillero Digital
